name: Forever Home Friday!
description: Meet Coco, an affectionate cat who found her purr-fect home! Animal Services has dozens of cats, dogs and other critters available for adoption.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Coco, an affectionate cat who found her purr-fect home! Animal Services has dozens of cats, dogs and other critters available for adoption. Find your next pet at www.SDDAC.com
